    • Constructor Detail

      • SchemaFactoryFinder

        public SchemaFactoryFinder(ClassLoader loader)

        Constructor that specifies ClassLoader to use to find SchemaFactory.

        Parameters:
        loader - to be used to load resource, SchemaFactory, and SchemaFactoryLoader implementations during the resolution process. If this parameter is null, the default system class loader will be used.

        private void debugDisplayClassLoader()

      • newFactory

        public SchemaFactory newFactory(String schemaLanguage)

        Creates a new SchemaFactory object for the specified schema language.

        Parameters:
        schemaLanguage - See Schema Language table in SchemaFactory for the list of available schema languages.
        Returns:
        null if the callee fails to create one.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the schemaLanguage parameter is null.

      • _newFactory

        private SchemaFactory _newFactory(String schemaLanguage)

        Lookup a SchemaFactory for the given schemaLanguage.

        Parameters:
        schemaLanguage - Schema language to lookup SchemaFactory for.
        Returns:
        SchemaFactory for the given schemaLanguage.

      • loadFromService

        private SchemaFactory loadFromService(String schemaLanguage,
                            String inputName,
                            InputStream in)
                               throws IOException

        Look up a value in a property file.

        Set debug to true to trace property evaluation.

        Parameters:
        schemaLanguage - Schema Language to support.
        inputName - Name of InputStream.
        in - InputStream of properties.
        Returns:
        SchemaFactory as determined by keyName value or null if there was an error.
        Throws:
        IOException - If IO error reading from in.

      • createServiceFileIterator

        private Iterator createServiceFileIterator()
        Returns an Iterator that enumerates all the META-INF/services files that we care.

      • which

        private static String which(String classname,
           ClassLoader loader)

        Search the specified classloader for the given classname.

        Parameters:
        classname - the fully qualified name of the class to search for
        loader - the classloader to search
        Returns:
        the source location of the resource, or null if it wasn't found
